website_summaries.verdict: Seaweed-based dental supplement helps dogs with oral hygiene.
pros: Powder formula that dog owners can mix with either wet or dry food to help with oral health
Should show results within a few weeks of continuous use
Uses all-natural ingredients without artificial preservatives or other additives
cons: More expensive per ounce than others
Some dogs won't like the taste

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for 7 years since my dog was a year old. I took her to the vet recently to have a small lump removed and ask them to do a dental cleaning while she was under. The vet told me there was almost nothing to do on the dental cleaning. This product really does work to keep her teeth white and plaque free.
customer_reviews.author: M. Piccolin

customer_reviews.title: Plaque on, Plaque off
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by experienced greyhound owners. Greyhounds tend to not have the best teeth. My grey is 8 years old. It's getting to the point that I put off dentals as long as possible due to problems with anesthesia. I have seem some good improvement using this daily. Product comes with a small measuring spoon. It would be nice if they had a clip on the side of the container for the clip. If you put it inside the bottle (they way the product arrives), it tends to get lost. This is definitely not a replacement for brushing your dog's teeth. I appreciate that it is helping with the tartar.
customer_reviews.author: simonshops

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua has been throwing up for days after I used this product. I will be bringing him to the vet tomorrow. I am so disappointed. I feel so bad for him. DO NOT GIVE THIS TO YOUR DOG!!!! Update: My dog passed away today. I am so upset.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wasz

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works. My older dogs have had multiple oral surgeries to clear up dental issues. This has really improved their dental health. Amazing! You see results within days.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this product: could have seriously adverse side effects. Made my dog incredibly sick, throwing up for two days straight when I only used it once. Threw it right in the trash. Never again. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof 3

customer_reviews.title: Scoop is very tiny and found inside the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet to give an accurate review. I will update after using. I’m hopeful with brushing teeth that we will see improvement. Just wanted to point out the scoop size. Scoop is very small and took a bit of digging to find it in the bottle. I measured out 4 scoops and that is equivalent of 1/4 teaspoon. So one scoop is 1/16 of a teaspoon.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Must have for canine dental health!
customer_reviews.text: After our past dogs have had dental issues and it was difficult to try to brush their teeth, I stumbled upon this. We recently adopted a new rescue and her teeth were okay and wanted to keep them healthy. I figured I'd give it a try and I am happy I did. Her teeth are healthy and white now. We even get compliments in the park and other owners asking about her teeth. It is easy to use: measure out with provided scoop by weight on the bottle and I sprinkling it over her dinner. It has been a few months and it whitened her teeth a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I received this on January 28, 2020 And I wish I would’ve made a before picture. My Yorkies teeth were horrible. I was about to have to take her in to have her teeth cleaned but being she’s 10 years old it kind of scares me and it would’ve cost me $300. I put one tiny scoop in her food every morning and this morning, February 2, 2020 , I looked at her teeth again and you would not believe the difference. This stuff works wonderfully. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo092582

customer_reviews.title: Did away with bad breath... but not plaque
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for 2 months , and while I did seem to notice a difference in breath .. there was no difference in plaque . I was looking for something a little quicker as my 6 year old cat has quite a bit of plaque . I’ve started using petzlife tooth gel and I have noticed major improvement in plaque. If you are willing to attempt it for several months to see if there’s improvement then it may work but for me, I wanted something that worked a little quicker due to the state of how much plaque she had .
customer_reviews.author: Rachie Bird

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for Yorkies, everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I like these for everyday use, but there’s another product that I use for once a week too, ( but if my dogs had that everyday they would be overweight). So that is why I recommend this for everyday, every meal use. Don’t smell it, you won’t like it but dogs sure do like it. Since it works and makes their breath very nice, I will continue using it. If it works on Yorkies it will work on your baby.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousMatters

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder!!!! My 125lb, 9 year old Rottweiler/Pitbull had lots of plaque and one of these Amazon reviews helped me find this product. I tried brushing her teeth and she didn’t like that. I purchased a bone looking, plastic item that has teeth so that when she bites it her teeth will be cleaned. Well she licked the peanut butter off (she doesn’t like dog toothpaste). So when I found this I was hopeful. It worked within two weeks. Now she gets it in her food every other day for maintenance. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has some really bad plaque on his back teeth. And really stinky breath. Took about 2 weeks and he went back to the vet for his monthly "shot". I told them to check his teeth. They were amazed with how great his teeth looked. No more plaque! And his breath was getting better. I eased off for a bit. Teeth still look good but his breath was getting stinky again, so I started back. It's a really tiny scoop, 1 time a day. Easy, doesn't smell back, and I just mix it into his food. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: jeri jed

customer_reviews.title: A HEALTHY INVESTMENT
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves it and it will reduce Vet bills. She used to pull strings through her teeth as part of playing, but doesn't feel the need very often using this product. She didn't bat an eye over the added texture or flavor to her food even though this is for both cats and dogs, not the specific cat formula. My other cat developed bad gums which ruined her kidneys and ultimately took her from us. I wish I'd known about this product back then. A healthy investment for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthians

customer_reviews.title: It does work, two dogs to prove it
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs, both over 50 lbs and each gets one scoop at each meal (breakfast and dinner). Within one week we noticed a difference in their breath. Within two weeks we noticed a difference in their teeth and how much plaque they had. Needless to say, we will continue to order this product as it truly does work.
customer_reviews.author: csearer

customer_reviews.title: helps my dogs teeth
customer_reviews.text: This does diminish the tartar on my dog's teeth. I put it on her food every morning. She does not seem to notice any taste difference. She had her yearly check up with the vet, and the vet said her teeth were about a number I , which is the lowest rating. I do also brush her teeth a couple times a week, but I am not too successful at it,as she likes to eat the toothpaste !! So, I will continue with the powder ,as I know it is helping. I am trying to avoid spending hundreds of dollars having her teeth cleaned, and I don't like the thought of putting her under to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Tashy

customer_reviews.title: Works well-give it time
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this in the water for my two dogs and my cat. My oldest dog’s teeth are terrible, and we have been hesitant to do a full dental due to having to put them under. I’ve been using this since February (it’s June now), and while her teeth are a lot better than they were, (Sheets do plaque have come off while using this), they aren’t perfect. We have seen a definite difference, but our vet still wants a full dental treatment for her. I am going to keep using it after the dental to keep the older dog’s teeth cleaner longer, and to prevent plaque building up on the other pets’ teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my cat's teeth
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently came to live with me. And with her came her cat, Tiger. When we visited a Vet about three months after she arrived, the Vet showed us that there was a lot of plaque on Tiger's gums. She suggested Plagueoff. We give a measure in Tiger's food each night and the plaque has disappeared (or is at least much better). My daughter and I are very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H. Tsukroff

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog sick...she didn't stop throwing up and her stomach made some crappy sounds for a week. Threw it away and never gave her more...she was fine after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Tran

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess with success.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is going on nine years old. Her teeth are spotless, as clean as when she was a puppy. Now, I must admit, we brush her teeth twice a week with a Oral B electric toothbrush, but we just started that a year ago. Our vet dismisses the Plaque Off as a gimmick, but our dog has been using this once a day since she was a year old. We were going to quit using it, but why? It's not expensive, and the logic behind the claims is solid. We've told others about it and their dogs had lots of plaque buildup. they claim that the plaque just melted off in a few weeks. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Swing Set

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are happy to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I can't really give this five stars because I am uncertain how to judge if it works! At least until some future vet visit. But I can say that it is very easy to use... just sprinkle on food with the little scoop provided. And the dogs seem very happy to eat it on top of their morning kibble, which is dampened with a little water. So I am giving it "stars" for easy of use and apparently for flavor (if they even taste it... but it does not put them off). But that is all I know so far.
customer_reviews.author: JBelle

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this almost a month and can ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this almost a month and can already tell a difference in my dogs teeth. He won't eat it if I just sprinkle it on his dry food though so I mix it in a little wet food then put it in his dish. He gobbles it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Kroden

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, found active ingredient can be bought in bulk for a third of the price. Too soon to tell how well working, but definitely will buy bulk in future if it does. It is algae, so has a very fishy smell. Took one dog a bit of time to get used to it. Her breath does seem to be a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Look above!!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy has had horrid yellow teeth since he was a puppy! Nothing worked to make them white, including pro cleaning. I got Plaqueoff and after a couple of months...viola!!!!...they're white as snow and no bad breath!!! Thank you to the makers of this product....not only are his teeth white but he'll be healthier w/o the plaque!!!! Whooppeeeee....
customer_reviews.author: Brynn S

customer_reviews.title: Made both dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: Beware, it made both of my dogs sick. I gave it to both my dogs-seemed to cause constipation in both of them, followed by bloody diarrhea for one of them. They had no other diet changes other than using this. Going in the trash! Do your research, reviews mention a lot about this happening on various sites that sell this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't reduced plaque at all in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was looking for a food additive that would reduce plaque on my dog's teeth. She's had, on average, a teeth cleaning per year since I've had her, with a lot of plaque build up at each one. On the up side, one bottle lasts my dog about 6 months, so it's cheap, and it does seem to make her breath smell better on days we use it (2 stars for that). However, it has not reduced plaque on her teeth at all, that we can tell. Dental wipes are the better option for us.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Dental ck up
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for only 10 days, our dog had his Vet check. After the vet checked the dogs teeth, he said he was pleased to say that he upgraded the teeth from a 3 to 2. Made my day. Bubba doesn't necessarily like it but I do. The vet wanted a minimum of $400 to clean his teeth so I am happy to say that we may be able to avoid that expense thanks tp Petslife!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Dixson

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: Pup had atrocious breath/saliva and began using a mouth spray several times per day for immediate remedy at first, then transitioned to this - 1 tiny scoop mixed in AM feed - and now occasionally apply spray. This routine, mixing in feed, fits a more permanent-like solution. Began noticing results w/in a few weeks as we reduced using spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Richards

customer_reviews.title: My vet asked what I had given my 15 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: My littles didn't let me clean her teeth the last couple yrs and they were a mess! I gave her this....just sprinkled a little on her food, she likes it! Took her to the vet to pull a couple bad ones and had them cleaned too. The cleaning was going to be +$400, but when I picked her up they asked what I'd been giving her for her teeth. They said the plak and yuk flaked right off and they only charged me $180!
customer_reviews.author: BettZZ

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For My Dogs Teeth
customer_reviews.text: I love this dental powder. My dog does not make it easy for me to brush his teeth so when I discovered plaqueoff that you can apply to the dog food I was very happy. I was even more happy when I noticed that it worked well. I thought it was gonna work slowly and over time but it works well and within the first week I noticed my dogs teeth and gums being cleaner. I am very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for my 7-month old lab who I believe got some bad teeth as a result of being on so many antibiotics when he was younger. The plaque on his teeth was much darker and seems to have lightened up considerably. The back molars are taking a little longer. I will continue to use this product, as well as give him chews that are supposed to help too. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to keep their dog's teeth clean as well as improve their breath. My thanks to all the positive feedback on this product. These comments made it much easier to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Great product - does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product for my two year old Great Pyrenees about three weeks ago. He was getting tartar buildup. In just the three weeks he's been using it, the plaque has almost completely disappeared. It was a darker brown, and now it's very light and a lot smaller of an area. He doesn't even notice it on his food, so obviously, the taste must not be bad. I'm really pleased. My vet recommended this, and I would have to agree with her.
customer_reviews.author: Jennk

customer_reviews.title: Product appears to reduce dental plaque.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have needed at least annual surgical tooth cleaning, and this food additive appears to stretch out the interval. It was recommended by our very experienced Vet. The bottle contains a mildly abrasive powder, probably made from dried seaweed. It has little aroma, and our dogs have never objected to having it sprinkled onto their food.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old dog needed a bit of help cleaning tartar from her teeth. She HATES having her teeth brushed. And I don't like the idea of putting her under for a cleaning. Heard about this product; tried it; and slowly the tartar is lessening. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work anymore
customer_reviews.text: This used to work Great ! My dogs teeth were sparkling for a couple of years. Thay changed something and now my dogs teeth are covered in plaque. I’ll never buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Better Breath
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of years now. I sprinkle a scoop, which is tiny, on top of my dogs food and they wolf it down. I have two yorkies, one is a picky eater and the other just swallows up everything, but they both will lick their bowls when I use Plaque off. I put it on their food once a day. Their breath is so much better when I use Plaque off and I can tell when I forget.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Do it...
customer_reviews.text: My pup legit eats this off the ground if I spill a little. His breath is noticeably fresher and it’s so easy to sprinkle on his food. It’s endorsed by the VOHC for plaque and tartar removal. Save money at the vet by not getting baby’s teeth cleaned. 1 bottle lasts me approximately 6 mo doing 1 scoop/day. I’ve recommended it to every family member I have that owns a baby dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing yet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used at least every other day for a month and I haven’t noticed that plaque is coming off. I still have some left and I’m hoping by the end maybe I’ll see some results?
customer_reviews.author: Awillette

customer_reviews.title: better breath
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this on two beagles. One beagle usually has pretty good teeth but the other one gets plaque buildup and it's hard to brush her teeth. Since starting this her breath has gotten better and you can tell it's making the plaque softer. She has been will now to do a soft tooth brush for just a minute. Seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about using this. But thought hey it’s worth to try than pay a lot more for my vet to clean my dog’s teeth. She hates the toothbrush! Trying to brush her teeth is a struggle! After just 3 days, her front teeth up to the canines are clean from the brown stains! The molar teeth are still stained but they’re not as bad as they were before! Will keep using this product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Chikorina

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn’t like the taste.
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out. I’ve had this about 2 weeks and my picky Pit takes all day to eat her food when we add it. Her bad breath is gone but she clearly doesn’t like the taste. Update: I don't give this to my dog often. When I do, it works. I pour it directly on the back of her tongue and give her treats after.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Has kept my cat's teeth clean for over a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My cat unfortunately doesn't have really great genetics when it comes to his teeth and it is practically impossible to try brush his teeth or even think about getting into his mouth. This meant that he started to build up a lot of plaque and eventually had to have 4 teeth extracted. Desperate to keep that from happening again I started to look for alternatives and found this product. Every vet visit since then has been an all-clear and his teeth are looking way better. Would definitely recommend for any cat owners.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: LET'S SEE THOSE TEETH!
customer_reviews.text: WE GIVE THIS TO OUR DOGS WITH EVERY MEAL. IT WORKS GREAT TO KEEP THE PLAQUE OFF OF THEIR TEETH. WE HAVE A 13 YEAR OLD LARGE DOG AND A 9 YEAR OLD LITTLE DOG. WE WILL BE BUYING THIS AS NEEDED!!
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It’s really difficult to brush my dogs teeth & this product has made a noticeable difference. He eats his food & it’s easy for us to use it. We get freeze fried dog food & moisten with water & sprinkle on top the freeze dried food. He eats it all & we have never had a problem. I have purchased this product for years & will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product that actually works to soften tartar off your pet's teeth. Works well in conjunction with a chew toy. It takes a month or so to start to notice a difference. My only complaint is that the included scoop is very difficult to retrieve out of the container. The handle needs to be longer so that oit doesn't get lost down in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work on plaque
customer_reviews.text: doesnt work on plaque, might work a little on bad breath
customer_reviews.author: caprock

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I noticed no difference. Does not seem to negatively affect the dog but found just brushing his teeth more often seems to be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: gEdin1983

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend, who is a dog training expert, highly recommended this product to me and she swears by it. I use it twice daily and I have been since March 2019 and although my dogs teeth are clean looking, her breath is still bad... I will continue to use it so it has time to get working.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Masters

customer_reviews.title: Works on my cat's plaque
customer_reviews.text: I gave the above ratings not knowing the actual scent or flavor, but my cat eats it on her food and doesn't mind so I suppose it's good because she's persnickety. It is keeping plaque off her teeth, which is good opposed to the vet cleaning her teeth at an atrocious cost.
customer_reviews.author: bbg - virgina

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical, but this product works. My maltepoo had a terrible breath and this product helped. It may take a couple of weeks to notice the difference. Her breath now is much more tolerable. No side effects on neither of my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Z.

customer_reviews.title: No nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have one mini pin and one chihuahua mini pin mix. The mix one has a very sensitive tummy so she would get sick if I give this her (because I also give her treats, she can't have too many different things a day). I ended up only giving it to the mini pin. The whole bottle is gone and I have seen no improvement. The tartar and plaque continued to build up while using this product. In fact, I wasn't here to leave a review. I came back here to see if they offered a money back guarantee. Since it was a waste of money and time, I decided to share my experience.
customer_reviews.author: The veg

customer_reviews.title: Works better than most
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work on already clean teeth --- keeping them clean. Works less so on plaque. Minor staining ,yes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a difference
customer_reviews.text: Im using it for my dog it’s been a month I don’t see a huge difference . He likes the taste and it’s easy to use . I’m going to keep using it but you definitely need to brush ur dogs teeth still
customer_reviews.author: sulma a.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've been using plaqueoff for several years. I started using this product when my dog was a puppy with white, healthy looking teeth. Her teeth are still as white as they were three years ago without regular cleanings. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Banchik

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! It works!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works! My family suggested it for my 11 year old dog. His breath and tarter are so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Dog's Delight
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using this product, so cannot speak to its efficacy. However, my dogs can be picky about new flavours and have not balked a bit at this additive. I'm hoping to see an marked improvement within the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Avouer

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: You do get a lot of scoops in the container. My dogs had no issue with it when added to their food and I have some very picky dogs. I didnt notice a huge difference but I also only used 1 bottle.
customer_reviews.author: HappyDayz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cat..makes dogs lips red
customer_reviews.text: good product by keep an eye on the dogs you will use it for. made big chunks of tarter come off of my cats teeth with an easy scrape.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Expiring soon
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product about two years ago and again a couple of months ago . I have a very small dog so this product should last a long time. I lost the original bottle during a move about a year ago and just found it recently. The original bottle I bought two years ago expires AFTER the new bottle I just bought. Ridiculous I won’t be able to use either here in about a month. How could they ship a bottle that expires in like two months?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoiding teeth cleanings
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for my dachshunds and the vet said they didn't need teeth cleanings again. We haven't had any yet, and I'm hoping to keep that up! This product works well. I sprinkle a scoop on their food in the morning and they eat it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could rave about this.
customer_reviews.text: As much as I’d like to like this. 3 bottles later and it didn’t remove any tartar off both of my dogs teeth. I did notice cleaner breathe and that’s about it. I also noticed one of my dogs started to lose her hair but not sure if that is a health issue she might have. I stopped using it and will keep an eye on if she has hair regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with no doggy hassles.
customer_reviews.text: Our (picky) dog does not reject this and it really really cleans his teeth.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Did not help
customer_reviews.text: No change in player build up for my dog. I actually think it got worse. We used this daily for over 6months after having a child so I was distracted. When I finally looked close at my dogs teeth I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I think it works. Been using it for several months along with Enzyme Toothpaste and his teeth look better. He was adopted and has bad teeth. He is getting a cleaning at the end of this month. I plan to continue to use this product after the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hamdoun

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: I dont notice a difference. Didn’t do anything for my dog. However - I started letting my pup chew on raw bones and have been feeding her liver as treats and her teeth look WAY better!! She also has no bad breath!
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: It does help but doesn't eliminate tooth problems
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. It doesn't eliminate problems with teeth for my little dog but it does help. My vet told me to keep using it so I am. Actually I would even if he had said it wasn't helping because I believe it does.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: After using this product every day for over a month now, there is no difference in plaque on my dog's teeth. I was hoping I wouldn't have to pay big bucks for a dental cleaning, but I guess there is no way around it.
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my dog everyday and I don't see any changes at all
customer_reviews.author: Purposeful

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: It works. It really works! The yellow/brown on her teeth is almost completely gone after 3 weeks. Hopefully we will not need to have her put under to have her teeth professionally cleaned, as she is older.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the dog
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to work as well as I would have hoped. She liked the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: My cats all four of them have amazing clean teeth now and this is my second order of plaque off. Will always use it for their dental health to avoid the vet office to be put down for cleaning, that is more unhealthy than anything. I picked off big chunks of hard tartar right off their teeth and have been gone since. Use this once a day in their wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Gia monty

customer_reviews.title: Makes plaque removable at home
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats this with no issue and it softens the plaque such that it pops off easily with a fingernail. It also keeps her breath fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Rifkin

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: We bought this due to a friend's recommendation to help with plaque build up and bad breath. We were surprised how quickly it worked. We add a little of the powder into our dog's food and he doesn't even seem to notice it's there. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were pretty good on this product so I thought I would give it a try... this product is AMAZING... within 2 days I seen a difference in my doggies teeth... it has been 7 days now and the yellowing is almost completely gone... the bottle will last a very long time, only 3 scoops daily and the scoops are tiny.. I easily give it to my guy’s mixing it with their raw food... great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken before and after pictures, but I was skeptical about if this product would even work. I use it for both my dogs, but got it for my elderly dog in particular as having him put under anesthesia for teeth cleaning makes me nervous and he hates having his teeth brushed. After a few weeks, I noticed their breath seemed better and I was also able to scrape some of the buildup off of his teeth with my nails. I'm so impressed! I sprinkle it over their food once a day and they don't seem to mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Easiest solution to plaque on dogs teeth
customer_reviews.text: This is such a magic product! My dogs plaque is almost all gone just using this product once a day. I probably use it every other day and there is a striking difference from the plaque and discoloration I've seen on my dogs teeth and gums after using this product. My vet recommended it and it's been the best, easiest dog care routine I've ever added. So awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really help
customer_reviews.text: Helps a little. Been using 3 months and not a big difference
customer_reviews.author: MGFarm

customer_reviews.title: This Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for several years now. Been using with our dog & 3 cats. This does really help with helping to keep their teeth as clean as possible. Hardly see plaque on teeth or have bad breath.
customer_reviews.author: KeleAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my pets.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for months. It didn’t seem to do anything for my dog or my cat, although they didn’t mind the taste. I will stick with the Oxyfresh water additive, which really decreases bad breath!
customer_reviews.author: Sage Pennington

customer_reviews.title: wow it works!!
customer_reviews.text: been sprinkling this on my dogs food for two months. she has bad tarter and i don't want to put her under anesthesia, being that she's 11 yrs/4lbs. i started to notice some white on her teeth but wasn't sure if it was my imagination. well today i noticed her front WHITE tooth. the tarter fell off! i nearly flipped, woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Did not make a difference
customer_reviews.text: Used it for over a month and did not notice a difference
customer_reviews.author: GM87

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on my dog for about 8 years now and it is a great product. If you are using this for the first time on your furbaby, it will take about a month or so to start seeing the benefits. My dog has never had bad breath or any plaque on his teeth. I do brush his teeth every other day or so for extra care.
customer_reviews.author: AKaplan

customer_reviews.title: Made big chunk dissolve off his teeth
customer_reviews.text: My dog had alot of build up but no rot or anything like that, just tartar build up that was big chunks on his teeth. This stuff dissolved the build up over the course of a month and saved us over $1200 in dental fees.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very great product and the cats seem to enjoy taste of their food.
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I have 4 cats. One 18.5, one almost 10 and 2 almost 3 years old. All 4 have teeth and gums improved. I had to use 2 bottles to see how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: It  takes care of the plaque!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both my cats and dogs. I don't know about the taste or scent except they all willingly eat it mixed in their food. Easy to use. It works and I am a repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I can see how much my dog teeth have improved. They hardly have any plaque now. And her breath smells much better. Wish I had known about this product years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Easy for healthy teeth!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great at keeping my dogs mouth healthy! He’s never had bad teeth, I started using this once all his baby teeth were out and adult ones started coming in, and between this and dental chews and just regular bones, his teeth look immaculate and he’s almost 2 years old!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I have a shitzu-spaniel mix female dog,she's 5 years old and a very picky eater,i purchased this product for her bad breath and her back teeth are starting to get rotten,i have being using this product for over a month,her breath smells better now and i'm starting to see her back teeth a bit cleaner,i put this powder in her food every day,i will keep buying it,i think it does work,slowly but it does.
customer_reviews.author: dealyz colon torres

customer_reviews.title: Keeps plaque formation down.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 y.o. Chihuahua has never had his teeth cleaned. I was told “minimal plaque “ at a recent visit to vet. I’ve used it since he was 6 months old. This is great news!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Fun

customer_reviews.title: Trying because reviews were so good
customer_reviews.text: Just started using. My rescue dog I just got has the worst breath and teeth. Gonna start with this and brushing. The reviews were good. So we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie S.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, I guess
customer_reviews.text: It hasn’t helped our dogs teeth much but it is helping, so I’m hopeful with continued use it’ll solve our plaque problem! I obviously don’t know how it tastes but our dogs didn’t seem to notice it in their food.
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended, cats breath doesn’t stink anymore
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I can give it stars for flavor because I’ll never taste it, but 5 stars my cats eat it and one of them had super stinky breath and it’s all normal now. The vet recommended this and it’s worked super well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well it actually works! And it doesn’t seem to bother the dogs and none of them got sick. One has a really sensitive stomach so I was nervous but she did fine on it!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I like the money I have saved. I now get my dog’s teeth cleaned every three years as opposed to every year. Really has worked for me and it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Watson

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes the taste
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't hate it so that deserves five stars!! I add it to his food--seems to help
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps teeth clean
customer_reviews.text: You use very little of it in your dogs food - and it has helped keep my dogs teeth clean and has reduced the need for professional vet cleaning
customer_reviews.author: SpiritJourney

customer_reviews.title: No more plaque
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been giving this to my dog for quite awhile. Every time she goes to the vet, they comment on how great her teeth look.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for my cat. Tried it for bad breath with no improvements. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie c.

customer_reviews.title: Want to keep your dog from needing dental care?
customer_reviews.text: I can see the effect on by dog’s teeth after only one month. Really makes a difference. So glad I am using it in his morning meal every day!!
customer_reviews.author: Marni Pahl

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot with the plaque on my dog's teeth and the bottle has lasted months.
customer_reviews.author: Gael Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Received the bottle and it is pretty small. However the amount to give your dog everyday is small. This product is really working well in my dogs teeth. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ProDen PlaqueOff Powder – Supports Normal, Healthy Teeth, Gums, and Breath Odor in Pets – 60 g
product_meta.description: ProDen PlaqueOff animal is an easy way for those dog and cat owners to care for their pet's teeth who don't have the patience or inclination to brush their dog or cat's teeth regularly. The product comes in powdered form and it is simply added on a daily basis to dry or wet food. Dogs and cats like the taste of the small amount that is added. Proden plaqueoff animal does not rely on topical application or friction. The product is ingested and works systemically. Additional Information The natural compound in the product comes out through the saliva and works to break down the bacterial biofilm that forms on the teeth and gums. This is how the natural bacteria in the mouth take hold onto the teeth and gums, colonizing and creating the oral problems of plaque and tartar, bad breathe and gingivitis. It does not change the ph of the mouth or kill off the normal levels of bacteria. Proden plaqueoff has been proven to reduce plaque and tartar on the teeth and gums, depending on composition, diet and how long it has been there. It then works to prevent bad breath, plaque and tartar from returning. Patients generally begin to see results over a 2-8 week period, and will see further benefits with continued use. Proden plaqueoff animal is made from a specific strain of selected seaweed harvested from above scandinavia. This seaweed has developed a natural defensive mechanism against bacterial biofilm. The product is made only from this seaweed and has no additives or chemicals added. It is human grade and human tested.
feature_bullets: NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Made with sea kelp harvested along the North Atlantic coast and is free from additives and artificial preservatives.
ORAL HYGIENE: Helps reduce plaque and tartar, freshen bad breath, and support teeth and gum health for your pets.
DIRECTIONS: Simply sprinkle over dry or wet food once a day.
PORTIONS: Small dogs and cats (55.1 lbs.) – 2 scoops
